title: Track Your Health With Garmin's Venu 2 Smartwatch, Now at Its Lowest Price for Black Friday
description: Prioritize your health and fitness 24/7 with the Garmin Venu 2 GPS smartwatch, which just reached a record-low price for Black Friday.
author: Anna Gragert
excerpt: Prioritize your health and fitness 24/7 with the Garmin Venu 2 GPS smartwatch, which just reached a record-low price for Black Friday.
text: Why You Can Trust CNET Our expert deal-hunting staff showcases the best price drops and discounts from reputable sellers daily. If you make a purchase using our links, CNET may earn a commission. Prioritize your health and fitness 24/7 with the Garmin Venu 2 GPS smartwatch, which just reached a record-low price for Black Friday. Anna Gragert (she/her/hers) was previously the lifestyle editor at HelloGiggles, deputy editor at So Yummy and senior lifestyle editor at Hunker. Over the past 10+ years, Anna has also written for the L.A. Times, Elle, Bust Magazine, Dazed, Apartment Therapy, Well+Good and more, focusing on all things lifestyle, health and wellness. Expertise Mental health, Personal care, Nutrition, Sleep Just in time for planning your New Year's resolutions, the Garmin Venu 2 GPS Smartwatch is now 42% off for Black Friday, bringing it to its lowest price ever at $150. If you aim to pay better attention to your health in 2025, this smartwatch can help you by measuring your sleep score, energy levels, stress, heart rate, respiration, hydration and even women's health. It would also make a generous holiday gift for the health enthusiast in your life. On its vivid AMOLED display, you can clearly see and track everything you need to know about your health. To boost your fitness, the smartwatch has 25 built-in indoor and GPS sports apps to track everything from walking and running to swimming, cycling and HIIT workouts. Free preloaded workouts also include yoga, cardio, Pilates and more, while you can create your own with the free Garmin Connect smartphone app. Runners can use Garmin Coach for free to create personalized adaptive training plans.  All of this comes with 4GB memory storage, 11 days of battery life (so you can forego charging to track your sleep) and bonus features such as smart notifications when paired with an Apple or Android smartphone. You can also use the smartwatch to make contactless payments with Garmin Pay.  The Garmin Venu 2 even considers your safety. During select activities, it offers incident detection and assistance. If you're in an area with network coverage and data connectivity, the smartwatch will send your live location in messages to emergency contacts.  Watch this: How to Shop Black Friday and Cyber Monday Deals Like a Pro 02:36 Why this deal matters This is a new all-time low price on the Garmin Venu 2 GPS smartwatch. Like other smartwatches and smart rings, it allows you to track your health 24/7 and provides additional features such as preloaded workouts and built-in apps for different types of activities. Since health tracking devices can get expensive, now is a great time to take advantage of this deal.  The Garmin Forerunner 165 is also down to a record-low price of $200, while the Garmin Fenix 7S Pro Sapphire Solar just hit a new low price at $650. And if you're looking for other Garmin models at a bargain price, be sure to check out our roundup of the best Garmin deals.
html:
Why You Can Trust CNET

Our expert deal-hunting staff showcases the best price drops and discounts from reputable sellers daily. If you make a purchase using our links, CNET may earn a commission.

Prioritize your health and fitness 24/7 with the Garmin Venu 2 GPS smartwatch, which just reached a record-low price for Black Friday.

Anna Gragert (she/her/hers) was previously the lifestyle editor at HelloGiggles, deputy editor at So Yummy and senior lifestyle editor at Hunker. Over the past 10+ years, Anna has also written for the L.A. Times, Elle, Bust Magazine, Dazed, Apartment Therapy, Well+Good and more, focusing on all things lifestyle, health and wellness.

Expertise Mental health, Personal care, Nutrition, Sleep

Just in time for planning your New Year's resolutions, the Garmin Venu 2 GPS Smartwatch is now 42% off for Black Friday, bringing it to its lowest price ever at $150. If you aim to pay better attention to your health in 2025, this smartwatch can help you by measuring your sleep score, energy levels, stress, heart rate, respiration, hydration and even women's health. It would also make a generous holiday gift for the health enthusiast in your life. 

On its vivid AMOLED display, you can clearly see and track everything you need to know about your health. To boost your fitness, the smartwatch has 25 built-in indoor and GPS sports apps to track everything from walking and running to swimming, cycling and HIIT workouts. Free preloaded workouts also include yoga, cardio, Pilates and more, while you can create your own with the free Garmin Connect smartphone app. Runners can use Garmin Coach for free to create personalized adaptive training plans. 

All of this comes with 4GB memory storage, 11 days of battery life (so you can forego charging to track your sleep) and bonus features such as smart notifications when paired with an Apple or Android smartphone. You can also use the smartwatch to make contactless payments with Garmin Pay. 

The Garmin Venu 2 even considers your safety. During select activities, it offers incident detection and assistance. If you're in an area with network coverage and data connectivity, the smartwatch will send your live location in messages to emergency contacts. 

Watch this: How to Shop Black Friday and Cyber Monday Deals Like a Pro

02:36

Why this deal matters

This is a new all-time low price on the Garmin Venu 2 GPS smartwatch. Like other smartwatches and smart rings, it allows you to track your health 24/7 and provides additional features such as preloaded workouts and built-in apps for different types of activities. Since health tracking devices can get expensive, now is a great time to take advantage of this deal. 

The Garmin Forerunner 165 is also down to a record-low price of $200, while the Garmin Fenix 7S Pro Sapphire Solar just hit a new low price at $650. And if you're looking for other Garmin models at a bargain price, be sure to check out our roundup of the best Garmin deals.
